Summary Technical professional with 15+ years of experience in process re-engineering and solution design for global SAP projects. Offer proven leadership skills and excel at collaborating across diverse levels, functions, and groups. Skilled in architecting, designing, testing, and deploying effective solutions based on changing business needs. Apply critical thinking skills and logical approach to determine requirements and deliver process and system improvements. Consistent track record of contributing to multi-year strategic enterprise programs focused on optimizing global business processes and expanding capabilities for Intel Corporation. Ensure delivery of projects within time constraints and specifications. Highlights include: 
 
-Led upgrade/transition of factory spare parts application from legacy SAP system to SAP ECC 6.0 across 22 factories worldwide; steered and mentored 20-person team spanning US, Ireland, Malaysia, Israel, and India.  
 
-Proved vital to mapping company-to-company indirect procurement process for M&A project, negotiating and gaining buy-in to use existing Intel process, which resulted in significant time, resource, and cost savings. 
 
-Led team to design application that automates creation of SRM operational contracts using business modeling tool to integrate diverse systems into service-oriented architecture.
